channel.title: Which client?
channel.description:
Hi guys. I've decided to get into old school style rsps's (a little custom ones)
I found a source of this 317 server that has some customs like dgs's, etc: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354350.0.html
Now the client is deleted, I wanted to ask whether you guys can supply me with a suitable and functional client, and/or tell me if any 317 client will work.
The reason I'm asking this is because the server has some customs in it, and I'm not that certain if every 317 client works.
Suggestions?

item.title: Which client?
item.dc:creator: @devilishomar devilishomar
